tool_description: Creates and manages voice profiles with specific characteristics including gender, age, accent, and vocal qualities for personalized text-to-speech synthesis.

voice_name.description: Name identifier for the voice profile

gender.description: Voice gender: male, female, or neutral

age_category.description: Age category: child, young_adult, adult, or senior

pitch_range.description: Pitch range: low, medium, or high

vocal_texture.description: Vocal texture: smooth, breathy, crisp, or warm

emotional_tone.description: Base emotional tone: neutral, friendly, professional, or cheerful

error_messages: Invalid gender: Use male, female, or neutral.
Invalid age category: Use child, young_adult, adult, or senior.
Invalid speech rate: Value must be between 0.5 and 2.0.
Invalid pitch range: Use low, medium, or high.
Invalid vocal texture: Use smooth, breathy, crisp, or warm.
Invalid emotional tone: Use neutral, friendly, professional, or cheerful.
usage: Specify voice_name, gender, and age_category as required parameters. Customize accent, pitch_range, speech_rate, vocal_texture, and emotional_tone as needed. Returns configured voice profile for synthesis.

profile_id.description: Unique identifier for the created voice profile
